tasks.title: Create CLI subscription client
tasks.description: Build a CLI client that can subscribe to events and display them in the terminal, working alongside browser clients

tasks.title: Create real-world subscriber examples directory
tasks.description: Build practical, production-ready subscriber implementations for common use cases like GitHub webhooks, Slack bots, email notifications, database logging, etc.

tasks.title: Create Web Push Demo
tasks.description: Create a complete demo showing MCP client subscribing to web browser push events, including server setup, browser client, and HTML page

tasks.title: Create browser push server
tasks.description: Create server that handles MCP connections and Web Push subscriptions

tasks.title: Create event publisher CLI
tasks.description: Create CLI tool to publish test events to demonstrate push notifications

tasks.title: Create browser client HTML page
tasks.description: Create HTML page with JavaScript that connects to MCP server and subscribes to push notifications

tasks.title: Plan Delivery Channel Extension Architecture
tasks.description: Create a comprehensive plan for adding new delivery channels (FCM, Webhook, Email, SMS, Slack, etc.) to the ESMCP protocol without implementing

tasks.title: Plan Cron-Based Channel
tasks.description: Design the cron-based delivery channel for recurring schedules (every hour, daily, weekly, etc) with cron expression support

tasks.title: Design Time-Based Delivery Architecture
tasks.description: Plan the architecture for time-based delivery channels including ScheduledDelivery types, ScheduleStore interface, and Scheduler service

tasks.title: Plan One-Time Scheduled Channel
tasks.description: Design the one-time scheduled delivery channel for future events (remind me in 4 hours, next Sunday, etc) with timestamp and natural language parsing
